title: How to check JVM arguments from the CLI in WildFly
content: There are several options to collect JVM arguments of WildFly application server from the Command Line. Firstly, if you want to check JVM arguments of a Java process, a simple way to do that is using the ‘jps‘ tool which is available in the ‘bin‘ folder of the JDK. Example: Also, you can use the ...
